## Final Review: Epic react-router-starter-p5l

**Date:** 2026-02-02  
**Epic:** React Router Starter Improvements  
**Progress:** 7/7 tasks closed | Epic status: in_progress → closed

### Acceptance criteria

- **Goal:** Update react-router-starter to be a comprehensive prototype starting point with best practices from reportory, Storybook, forms library, and testing examples.
- **Outcome:** All criteria met via completed child tasks (p5l.1–p5l.7).

### Task summary

| Task | Title | Status | Notes |
|------|--------|--------|--------|
| p5l.1 | Update Dependencies | closed | Bun, React Router 7, Vite, etc. |
| p5l.2 | Setup Storybook with React Router | closed | Storybook 8, React Router mocking, example stories |
| p5l.3 | Lambda Curry Forms Integration | closed | @lambdacurry/forms, Zod, contact form, Storybook |

| p5l.6 | Biome Config Review | closed | Lint/format scripts, full lint pass |
| p5l.7 | Update Documentation | closed | README, usage, Storybook/testing docs |

### Quality gates (final run)

- **Typecheck:** `bun run typecheck` (apps/todo-app) — passed
- **Lint:** `bun run lint` (apps/todo-app) — passed (31 files)
- **Tests:** `bun run test:run` (apps/todo-app) — 28 tests, 5 files, passed
- **Build:** `bun run build` (root turbo) — todo-app build passed

### Deliverables verified

- **Storybook:** .storybook/ configured; stories for add-todo, contact-form, todo-filters, todo-item
- **Forms:** contact-form with @lambdacurry/forms + Zod; create-todo route
- **Testing:** format.test.ts, todo-context.test.tsx, contact-form.test.tsx, add-todo.test.tsx, home.integration.test.tsx; test/setup.ts, test-utils.tsx

- **Docs:** README (features, usage, Storybook, testing); TESTING.md; AGENTS.md

### Conclusion

Epic is complete. All child tasks are closed, quality gates pass, and the starter is a solid prototype with Storybook, Lambda Curry forms, testing examples, and AI rules. No follow-up tasks identified. Closing epic.

comments.author: Jake Ruesink
comments.text:
Commit: 6fdb415 - chore(deps): update all dependencies to latest stable [skip ci]

Summary:
- Ran `bun update`: React Router 7.8→7.13, React 19.1→19.2, turbo 2.5→2.8, vite 6.3→6.4, typescript 5.9.2→5.9.3, @lambdacurry/forms, zod, etc.
- Resolutions: single vite (6.4.1), react/react-dom 19.2.4, react-router-dom/react-router 7.13.0.
- vitest.config.ts: type cast for vite-tsconfig-paths plugin to satisfy vitest config (vite vs vitest’s nested vite type mismatch).
- biome.json: added !**/build/** and !**/dist/** to includes so lint does not run on build output.
- Added react-router-dom@7.13.0 so tests use the same Router context as remix-hook-form (useHref); tests were failing with “useHref() may be used only in the context of a <Router> component” until router version was unified.

Verification: typecheck, build, lint, test:ci all pass.

Revision Learning:
**Category**: Process
**Priority**: Medium
**Issue**: After `bun update`, vitest and root vite had duplicate vite installs (vitest/vite 6.3.5 vs root 6.4.1), causing vitest.config.ts typecheck to fail; add-todo tests failed due to react-router-dom nesting its own react-router (7.8.0) so Router context did not match remix-hook-form’s useHref.
**Recommendation**: Document in CONTRIBUTING or AGENTS.md: (1) use resolutions for vitest/vite and vite-node/vite when upgrading vite to avoid typecheck failures; (2) add react-router-dom as direct dep at same major as react-router and use it in tests that render components using remix-hook-form/useHref.
**Files/Rules Affected**: package.json (resolutions, react-router-dom), apps/todo-app/vitest.config.ts, biome.json

Signed: Engineering Agent — Code Wizard
